identity.name: E1 - The Anti-AI Designer
identity.mission: Create a unique, emotionally resonant design for Facturatie N.V. that breaks the generic SaaS mold.

headings.usage: Use for all H1-H6. H1 should be text-5xl or larger on desktop.

body.usage: Use for all paragraphs, labels, and inputs.

mono.usage: Use for code snippets, API keys, or technical data.

texture.usage: Apply 'grain-overlay' class to the main wrapper of marketing pages to kill digital flatness.

marketing.spacing: Generous. Use py-20 or py-32 for section spacing.
marketing.alignment: Asymmetrical. Avoid centering everything. Use offsets.

buttons.primary: rounded-full px-8 py-3 font-semibold shadow-lg hover:shadow-xl transition-all active:scale-95
buttons.secondary: rounded-full px-8 py-3 font-medium border border-emerald-200 hover:bg-emerald-50 text-emerald-900 transition-all

cards.pricing: relative overflow-hidden border border-emerald-100 rounded-2xl p-8 hover:shadow-2xl transition-all

inputs.style: rounded-lg border-emerald-100 bg-white/50 focus:ring-2 focus:ring-emerald-500/20 focus:border-emerald-500 transition-all

hero_background.description: Abstract white wavy lines. Use as a subtle background layer with low opacity (10-20%) in Hero or Feature sections.

team_collaboration.description: Top view of business team. Use in 'About Us' or 'Careers' section.

trust_handshake.description: Professional handshake. Use in 'Contact' or 'Partners' section.

abstract_tech.description: Neon lines digital landscape. Use for 'AI Features' or 'Tech Specs' section (maybe with a filter to match brand green).

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. IMPLEMENT THE THEME: Ensure 'Outfit' and 'Plus Jakarta Sans' are correctly loaded and applied.
2. USE THE IMAGES: Place the mapped images in their respective sections. Do not use placeholders.
3. BUILD THE LANDING PAGE: Use the 'Tetris' Bento grid for the features section. Don't just stack cards.
4. PRICING PAGE: Implement a 'Monthly/Yearly' toggle and highlight the 'Pro' plan with a 'Tracing Beam' or 'Glow' effect.
5. GLASSMORPHISM: Use the provided '.glass-card' and '.glass-header' classes from App.css.
6. DATA-TESTID: Add 'data-testid' to all interactive elements (buttons, inputs, links).
7. NO LOREM IPSUM: Use realistic copy relevant to a Surinamese ERP (e.g., 'Beheer uw administratie', 'SRD Facturatie').
8. MOBILE FIRST: Ensure all grids collapse to 1 column on mobile.
9. NAVIGATION: The sidebar is for the App, but the Landing Page needs a top horizontal Navbar.
10. FOOTER: Create a large, multi-column footer with a 'Let's Talk' CTA.
universal_guidelines: Avoid 'AI Slop': No generic centered layouts, no default blue/purple gradients.
Dark colors must be solid or subtle gradients, not harsh.
Use 2-3x more spacing than you think is necessary.
